name: Interface CompoundAssignmentTree
text:
A tree node for compound assignment operator.
 Use getKind to determine the kind of operator.

 For example:
 
   variable operator expression
codes:
@Deprecated(since="11",
            forRemoval=true)
public interface CompoundAssignmentTree
extends ExpressionTree

methods.description: Returns the left hand side (LHS) of this assignment.
Returns the right hand side (RHS) of this assignment.
